p: The critically endangered Asian pangolin species Manis pentadactyla and Manis javanica are featured on the EDGE of existence list of unique and endangered mammals (Curr. Biol. (2018) 28, R1283–R1286). The Zoological Society of London (ZSL), UK, which compiled this ranking, has championed the case of pangolin conservation, which until 2012 didn’t find much attention.
